cab.content: THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY13 GOYEBNME-J? *SECRET,G.T.-1964. WAR CABINET.Copy of Telegram from Naval Attache. Petrograd toAdmiralty.Ho. 304, ' 5th September,1917.304. Capture of Riga was not preceded or supported by naval operations. Russian naval position in Gulf of Riga temporarily unchanged. (Russian) "SLAVA" with four gunboats now in Gulf. (Russian) "TZESAREVICH" on the way thither, but 3rd Sept detained at South end of Moon Island Sund by low water, though hoped today (Tuesday) to get through. 3rd Sept no German ships reported inside Gulf of Riga except one submarine.
